entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon then increasing to 60 gusting to 80. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
